eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Allegan; Berrien; Van Buren, MI; AT 07:04 PM ON SEP 16, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:19 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a required weekly test of the Southwest Michigan Emergency Alert System originating from the van Buren County Emergency Operations Center. If this had been an actual emergency, such as a tornado, a toxic material release, nuclear plant incident, wide spread phone or power outages or other State or local emergency that affects your safety, an official message would have followed the alert tones. This concludes this test of the Emergency Alert System.
